mapper.select: SELECT B.BD_ID AS BD_ID, B.TITLE AS TITLE, B.READ_CNT AS READ_CNT, B.CREATE_DT AS CREATE_DT, M.MEMBER_NICK AS MEMBER_NICK, M.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID

SELECT B.BD_ID AS BD_ID, B.TITLE AS TITLE, B.CONTENT AS CONTENT, B.READ_CNT AS READ_CNT, B.CREATE_DT AS CREATE_DT, M.MEMBER_NICK AS MEMBER_NICK, M.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE BD_ID = #{bdId}
